MajorClaims.MC1: staying with the parents for longer time does more benefits than disadvantages to the young adult
MajorClaims.MC2: staying longer with parents is a better choice

Claims.C1: living with parents longer brings about memories with parents, less cost, and advice from parents
Claims.C3: the parents can save money, if their children live with them longer
Claims.C4: taking advice from parents, the young adult can go through obstacles easily

Premises.P1: the young adult can have more experience with his parents
Premises.P2: The young adult has to try to create memories with his dad and mom in the early age
Premises.P3: When having a job, it is of low possibilities to work in his hometown
Premises.P4: If he lives with his parents for longer time, they have more chances to share the feelings, exercise, and travel together
Premises.P5: All memories become priceless treasure as time passes by
Premises.P6: he may have to rent a house and the rental would become a burden for parents
Premises.P7: another daily expense is also the considerable outgoings
Premises.P8: Spending much money may not result in what the parents expect their children to be
Premises.P9: living at home costs less than living outside
Premises.P10: Learning to be independent means that the young adult needs to leave home
Premises.P11: the young adult needs father and mother's suggestions
Premises.P12: When in dilemma, the parents can comfort him and give him a big hand
Premises.P13: They are the people who are most familiar with him can give a suitable advice and lead him to the right way
Premises.P14: If the parents do not help him immediately, he would have to suffer more pain
